sentences.en: Anyone who wants to avoid the flu should consider getting a vaccination.
sentences.cn: 如果不想得流感，就该考虑接种疫苗。

sentences.en: But everyone can be against hepatitis B infections through vaccination.
sentences.cn: 同时那些“慢性携带者”也能够获得多种治疗.

sentences.en: But now there is no mumps at all in some countries because of vaccination.
sentences.cn: 但现在因为接种疫苗在某些国家腮腺炎已经不见。

sentences.en: Conclusion BCG vaccination in temporary resident children should be strengthened.
sentences.cn: 结论外来儿童的卡介苗接种工作应予加强.

sentences.en: Doctors suggest getting a tetanus vaccination every ten years.
sentences.cn: 医生建议每十年注射一次破伤风疫苗.

sentences.en: I'm to have a vaccination tomorrow.
People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.cn: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

sentences.en: Smallpox can be contained by vaccination.
sentences.cn: 种牛痘疫苗可以控制住天花.

sentences.en: There are some reasons why some people believe they have gotten influenza after vaccination.
sentences.cn: 有若干原因可说明为什么有些人认为他们在接种疫苗之后患上流感。

sentences.en: These findings might be explained by lack of timely vaccination and/or occurrence of disease at an early age.
sentences.cn: 这些发现也许是由于没有及时接种疫苗以及/或者婴儿早期罹患过肺炎。

sentences.en: Vaccination and other prophylactic measures can be carried out.
sentences.cn: 可以采取疫苗接种和其他预防措施。
种牛痘防天花是有效的.
接种牛痘能使人免患天花.

sentences.en: Vaccination is a preventive against smallpox.
sentences.cn: 种痘是预防天花的方法

sentences.en: We're immune to smallpox as a result of vaccination.
sentences.cn: 我们种了牛痘,所以不会得天花.

sentences.en: When is the best time to get a flu vaccination?
sentences.cn: 什麽是注射流感疫苗的最佳时候?

sentences.en: You must go to Kunming Municipal Heath Vaccination Bureau for confirmation.
sentences.cn: 你应该到昆明卫生检疫局去认定.
